feed.title: Cirqlab
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Ugrainium 2.35
entry.summary: Problem Description Out of a typical day, I’ve measured that about 2-3 hours goes toward dealing with food in some way. Time spent preparing, foraging, eating, shopping, cleaning-up afterward, or recovering from the post-lunch sleepeez. That’s close to 20%, more than a day a week, of my waking life tied-up with eating. What if that time could be taken back and used for something else less mund...
